version_description: UI tweaks, bugfixes, and performance improvements.
UI tweaks, bugfixes, and performance improvements.

UI tweaks, bugfixes, and performance improvements.
UI tweaks, bugfixes, and performance improvements.

- Added a list of up to 5 "Recent Searches" in location settings for quick access
- Copy updates, rise/Transit/Set times now rounded to the nearest minute

-New features in Settings:
-FAQ
-Azimuth heading option
-Time zone override option
-Vertical swipe to zoom option
-User feedback survey
-Added a "What's New" page

- Now supporting landscape mode on iPad!
- Tap on events for contextual options and information like Moon phase, illumination, and magnitude
- Tap the share button to create and send event cards
- Better note filtering UX
- Updated FAQ
